categories: Category:Sith acolytes and apprentices of the Sith Empire

nodes.text: Vassek was a male Chagrian apprentice of the Sith Lord Khreusis living during the Cold War. He was present when his master was confronted by Kallig, who sought to acquire his mask.
Vassek appears in Star Wars: The Old Republic during the Sith Inquisitor class mission on the planet Korriban.
